text: Ringo Lam Ling-Tung (, Cantonese: Lam Ling-tung; 1955 - 29 December 2018) was a Hong Kong director, producer, and screenwriter. His best known work was Aces Go Places IV. Lam directed City on Fire in 1987, which led him to winning his first Hong Kong Film Award. On December 29, 2018, Lam was found dead at his home in Hong Kong, aged 63. ==References== Category:1955 births Category:2018 deaths Category:Chinese movie directors Category:Chinese screenwriters Category:Hong Kong filmmakers Category:Chinese movie producers Category:20th- century Chinese writers
